name: Cash Her Heart
description:
(BTW you hold TAB to see your hunger level!)

She's waiting on the engagement ring.

All you have to do is save up for it.

What are you willing to do for her?

You love her.

Love is strong.

Love is great.

Love is blinding.

Cash Her Heart is a simulation game where you are blindly in love with a woman. You do everything you can to buy her that engagement ring, no matter the cost.
